PageTitle: display bgp flow vpnv6 all peer
FuncDef: The display bgp flow vpnv6 all peer command displays BGP IPv6 VPN FlowSpec and BGP VPNv6 FlowSpec peer information.
CLIs: display bgp flow vpnv6 all peer
Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp flow vpnv6 all peer
Total number of peers : 1                 Peers in established state : 1
Peer            V          AS  MsgRcvd  MsgSent  OutQ  Up/Down       State  PrefRcv
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After BGP FlowSpec is enabled and a BGP FlowSpec peer relationship is established, you can run the display bgp flow vpnv6 all peer command to query information about the BGP FlowSpec peer.
